name: Afzal Metal Refine Works
overview: Established in the year 1991, we, “Afzal Metal Refine Works”, are involved in manufacturing and supplying a wide range of Aluminium Utensils. Our range of products encompasses Aluminium Top Cover, Aluminium Mathar Top, Aluminium Half Top Utensil and Aluminium Handi. Also, we offer Aluminium Hand Wash Utensil, Aluminium Kadai, Aluminium Dabba, Aluminium Circle and Aluminium Top. The range made available by us is manufactured using optimum-grade aluminium that is sourced from most trusted vendors of market with the aid of our procuring agents. Our product-line is highly appreciated by customers for its intrusive attributes such as splendid designs, fine finish, corrosion resistance, excellent polish, dimensional accuracy and lightweight
